snippet.title: The Basics of Galactic Civilizations - Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: http://steam.gs/l/pb1sn/basicsofgalciv

Venture into the depths of the Galactic Civilizations universe, where we'll uncover the essential mechanics driving this popular 4X strategy series. Within this expansive galaxy of gameplay elements, we'll witness the intriguing combinations that create diverse campaigns and stories, captivating players in the world of 4X games.

--- 
Galactic Civilizations IV:
Website - https://www.galciv4.com/
Discord - https://discord.gg/galciv
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GalCiv/
Twitter - http://twitter.com/galciv
Reddit -  https://www.reddit.com/r/GalCiv/

#strategygames #pcgaming #devblog
